panels.description: Calculated at a 1 hr averaging window
panels.title: Slot leading share (% of slots led / 1h)
Rejected blocks during the last day

panels.description: Cardano-node ping latency measured from localhost with cardano-cli ping
panels.title: Ping latency (ms)

panels.description: Counts only memory that is physically free
panels.title: Node peak memory allocated (from OS)

panels.description: Transactions accepted into the mempool, shown as a per-second rate averaged over the displayed interval.
panels.title: Tx Submissions Accepted per second, averaged over $rate_interval_mimic

panels.description: Transactions rejected during submission (validation failures, mempool policy, etc.), shown as a per-second rate averaged over the displayed interval.
panels.title: Tx Submissions Rejected per second, averaged over $rate_interval_mimic

panels.description: Percentage of submitted transactions that are rejected, averaged over the displayed interval.
panels.title: Tx Rejection Rate %, averaged over $rate_interval_mimic

panels.description: The number (after merges) of I/O requests completed per second for the device
panels.title: Disk IOps Completed averaged over $rate_interval_mimic

list.description: Exactly mimics Grafana's $__rate_interval variable, so that we can display it.
list.label: rate interval
list.name: rate_interval_mimic
